Package com.oss.teamwork.teamshare.messaging

Interface Summary
AcceptableMessage  
Mailbox Represents a user's mailbox, a repository-type element, providing the set of Message objects sent or received by an user.
 

Class Summary
InvitationMessage  
Message Represents a Message transmitted between Teamshare users.
MessageFactory Factory component that creates different types of Message objects depending on their purpose (invitations, ownership transfers, replies).
